data.name: TikTok Dark
VivaForum Cleaned Up
data.description: Clean Viva forum without ads and sidebar. On mobile screens the pesky Read More function is disabled. Currently there is one downside: the block user function doesn't work anymore so posts from blocked users are still visible.

data.name: WoWs Development Blog Dark Mode
data.description: The World of Warships development blog site will now match the existing dark theme of the World of Warships homepage.

data.name: Pinterest Clean Minimalist (no border's)
data.description:
Pinterest home feed clean and pins without border's
Hide the descriptions of pins, leaving just the image.

data.name: olx.ua
data.description:
2 плитки в строку во вкладке "Избранные результаты поиска", занимают меньше места и улучшается читабельность

update 15.10.2018:
- чистые плитки в "Избранные результаты поиска"
- фикс ширины плиток в "Избранные объявления", режим "галерея"


update 18.02.2019:
- вернул заголовок обьявления в личной переписке

data.name: BaiDu Flat
data.description:
Enlarge font size, reduce saturation, and remove unnecessary elements.
自用。适合老年冲浪选手的冷淡样式。首页背景来自 Unsplash 随机图片。

data.name: CSDN BLOG PRETTIFY(CSDN博客页美化)
data.description:
去广告。固定半透明式标题，悬停显示菜单。文章内容占全屏，需要看相关信息悬停即可。
7.19更新 修复bug
8.9更新 修复页头跳动bug
9.4更新 长博客自动展开、优化动画效果、去广告
9.22解决bug，优化页面
9.26更新优化样式，去除更多的广告，评论区自动展开
2020.4.28 回来重写并优化了一下样式

data.description: A pink Leah Ashe themed Roblox homepage wallpaper for those who stan the pink queen

data.name: Pitch Black Google Classroom
data.description: Just a pitch black version of the google classroom website. Might have some bugs as it's my first theme

data.name: Dracula Theme - Qlik Sense Data Load Editor
data.description: Theme for the Qlik Sense Data Load Editor using Dracula's theme colours. Even though this project has no association with it, you can get more info here https://draculatheme.com/.
